about_the_game:
Sockventure is a story about a kid whose favorite sock gets eaten by a cursed washing machine. Kid needs immediate help and calls superhero Sockman to the rescue and the adventure begins. Help Sockman to find his way through the dangerous levels to find the missing sock inside the washing machine!



Beat 50 levels of hardcore platforming, get new skills such as double jumping, wall jumping and dashing and bring the socks back safely. Collect coins, find the missing socks and customize your character with multiple unique outfits.

Features

  • 50 Levels - 50 handcrafted Levels.
  • Special Skills - Get new Skills during the game. Wall jumping, double jumping and dashing.
  • Challenges - Multiple Challenges to beat.
  • Socks - Find hidden Socks and use them as your Skin.
  • Coins - Find and collect all the coins to unlock Dark World.
  • Dark World - The Dark World offers new more challenging Levels to test your skills in.

name: Sockventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom X4 9650
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Make sure superhero Supersock finds all the missing socks inside the cursed washing machine, in this challenging 2D platformer game. Sockventure has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls and fun ever-changing gameplay.
